mapper.sql: id, activity_id, user_id, invite_id, finish_order_time, machine_code, create_time
mapper.select:
SELECT A.activity_id,
A.user_id, C.login_name AS invite_login_name, B.name AS activity_name, B.start_time as begin_time, B.end_time as end_time, count(*) as invite_num, count(a.finish_order_time) as invite_order_num FROM activity_collect_coupons_regist_record A LEFT JOIN activity_collect_coupons B ON A.activity_id = B.id LEFT JOIN sys_buyer_user C ON C.id = A.user_id where 1 = 1
GROUP BY a.activity_id,a.user_id ORDER BY B.start_time DESC, invite_num DESC

SELECT A.id, A.activity_id, A.user_id, B.name AS activity_name, B.start_time as begin_time, B.end_time as end_time, C.login_name AS invite_login_name, D.login_name AS be_invite_login_name, A.create_time, A.finish_order_time, A.machine_code FROM activity_collect_coupons_regist_record A LEFT JOIN activity_collect_coupons B ON A.activity_id = B.id LEFT JOIN sys_buyer_user C ON C.id = A.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_buyer_user D ON D.id = A.invite_id where 1 = 1
AND A.activity_id in
#{item}
ORDER BY B.start_time DESC

SELECT ac.`face_value` FROM activity_collect_coupons_regist_record regist LEFT JOIN activity_collect_coupons coupons ON regist.`activity_id` = coupons.`id` LEFT JOIN activity_coupons ac ON ac.`activity_id` = coupons.`id` WHERE coupons.`type` = 3 AND coupons.`status` = 1

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM activity_collect_coupons_regist_record record LEFT JOIN activity_collect_coupons coupons ON record.`activity_id` = coupons.`id` WHERE record.`user_id` = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
